basics.name: Jalen Lum
basics.label: Computer Science Undergraduate - UH Manoa
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2025.

volunteer.summary: 8bit is a group of students from the University of Hawaii at Manoa passionate about software development and creating impactful software solutions.
highlights: Facilitated in the development of four software services for two distinct clients, leveraging modern technologies such as Django and TypeScript
Communicated regularly with clients to understand their project requirements, preferences, and feedback, resulting in a tailored and successful project outcome that exceeded expectations

awards.title: Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.8 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: United Steelworkers Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students to support  their education, typically based on academic achievement, talent, achievements or other criteria.
